entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 06 at 2:35PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High River Flows and Flooding due to Snowmelt... Despite cooler temperatures since Thursday, rivers and streams are expected to continue running high as warm temperatures have melted much of the valley and foothills snowpack, which is making its way into the main stem rivers. Local emergency management reported widespread low-land flooding
